title: Flax
brief_description: Opens with scenes of the flax industry in pre-war Ireland. With the outbreak of war, Britain’s supply of European flax was cut off. The film shows various improvements adopted to increase the production of flax in Britain, including the use of machines to pull the fibre and also the use of material in the unretted state.
